C

calculate(String, String) - Method in class hextodec.ConversionModel
method that chooses conversion method based on string containing it
calculateByParameters(List<String>) - Method in class hextodec.ConversionController
checks the command line arguments and sets the default ones if needed and in the end fires the calculation button if string doesnt match anything in enum then select default
calculateDecToHex(String) - Method in class hextodec.ConversionModel
Process the calculation from decimal format to hexadecimal
calculateHexToDec(String) - Method in class hextodec.ConversionModel
Process the calculation from Hexadecimal format to decimal
comboBoxCalculateMethod - Variable in class hextodec.ConversionView
